Steps.Message: Update at 03:42 - I appreciate your continued patience this evening. I know having power cuts as often as this must be very disruptive, and our staff are doing everything they can to get this resolved. They are still testing our network in the area, and depending on the local infrastructure this can take some time. However, once they update us we'll know if our estimated timeframe needs to change and why, and I'll let you know as soon as we hear. In the meantime, if we can offer any support or advice, our team are always available to talk on 105.

We became aware of a power cut at 01:56. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 03:42 - I appreciate your continued patience this evening. I know having power cuts as often as this must be very disruptive, and our staff are doing everything they can to get this resolved. They are still testing our network in the area, and depending on the local infrastructure this can take some time. However, once they update us we'll know if our estimated timeframe needs to change and why, and I'll let you know as soon as we hear. In the meantime, if we can offer any support or advice, our team are always available to talk on 105.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
